verses.name: Matthew 26:46
verses.text: Rise, let us be going: behold, he is at hand that doth betray me.

verses.name: Matthew 26:47
verses.text: And while he yet spake, lo, Judas, one of the twelve, came, and with him a great multitude with swords and staves, from the chief priests and elders of the people.

verses.name: Matthew 26:48
verses.text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign, saying, Whomsoever I shall kiss, that same is he: hold him fast.

verses.name: Matthew 26:49
verses.text: And forthwith he came to Jesus, and said, Hail, master; and kissed him.

verses.name: Matthew 26:50
verses.text: And Jesus said unto him, Friend, wherefore art thou come? Then came they, and laid hands on Jesus, and took him.
